How to know if you will like this film.

If you hated episode 7\, you will hate this movie.
If you liked episode 7\, there is 50% chance you will hate this movie.
If you love the trilogy and care about the characters\, you will hate this movie.
If you are a casual movie fan\, you might like this movie.
If you are a professional critic (bought by disney)\, you will love this movie.
